title: Raaga Kundan Haaram: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: E-F Color). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Exquisite Kundan setting meticulously handcrafted in a traditional oval motif pendant. The pendant features intricate floral patterns accentuated with sparkling diamonds. A central Ruby Cabochon adds a touch of regal elegance, while a single Emerald adorns the top. The necklace chain is beautifully crafted with diamond-studded links and finished with subtle gold bead drops, creating a graceful modern fusion.
occasions: or to add a touch of heritage to a contemporary outfit.
description: This Raaga Kundan Haaram is a timeless investment, blending traditional South Indian craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality Kundan setting ensures lasting beauty, while the vibrant gemstones add a touch of regal sophistication. The exceptional clarity and cut of the diamonds guarantee unparalleled sparkle, making it a statement piece for any occasion. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
